p:
A5: Synthesis of ( E)-3-(3″-nitrophenyl)-1-[4′-(trifluoromethyl)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one: Yield: 60%; m.p. 85 °C; R
f = 0.5 (30% Ethyl acetate in Hexane); FT-IR (KBr, cm −1): 1659 (C=O), 1623 (C=C Ar), 1536 (CH=CH), 1250 (-CF 3), 3010 (Ar C-H stretching), 1446 (NO 2); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm): 7.92 (1H, d, J = 15.7 Hz, -CO-CH=), 8.15 (1H, d, J = 16 Hz, Ar-CH=), 7.82–8.65 (4H, m, C-2′, 3′, 5′, 6′, Ar-H), 7.68–7.89 (4H, m, C-2″, 3″, 5″, 6″, Ar-H); ESI-MS: 322.25 [M + H] +.
